ConfigAuditLog.summary: Enables or disables the audit log feature and delivers audit logs to buckets.

schema.description: The bucket to which audit logs are delivered.

Specifies whether to enable the audit log feature. Valid values:

*   enable
*   disable

403.errorMessage: 获取OSS bucket权限失败，请检查对应OSS权限设置: %s

500.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to some unknown error.

ConfigAuditLog.title: ConfigAuditLog
ConfigAuditLog.description:
*   The region of the bucket must be the same as the region where the security audit feature is enabled.
*   If the security audit feature is enabled, do not delete Object Storage Service (OSS) buckets. If you delete OSS buckets, audit logs fail to be delivered.
*   Only electronic virtual security modules (EVSMs) and general virtual security modules (GVSMs) within the Chinese mainland support the security audit feature.

GetAuditLogStatus.summary: Queries the status of the audit log feature in the current region.

schema.description:
Specifies whether to obtain the list of OSS buckets that can be used to store audit logs. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Success.description:
Indicates whether the request is successful. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

AuditLogStatus.description:
Indicates whether the audit log feature is enabled. Valid values:

*   enable
*   disable

GrantedServiceAccess.description:
Indicates whether Cloud Hardware Security Module is authorized to deliver logs. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

AuditOssBucket.description: The bucket that stores audit logs.

OssBuckets.description: A list of buckets that can be used to store audit logs.

403.errorMessage: 获取对应OSS bucket权限失败，请检查OSS权限设置: %s

500.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to some unknown error.

InitializeAuditLog.summary: Authorizes Cloud Hardware Security Module to deliver logs.

GetBackup.summary: Queries the information about a specified backup.

CreateTime.description: The time when the backup is created. The value is accurate to the millisecond. The value is a UNIX timestamp.

ExpireTime.description: The expiration time of the backup. The value is accurate to the millisecond. The value is a UNIX timestamp.

InstanceId.description: The ID of the hardware security module (HSM) that is associated with the backup.

Status.description:
The status of the backup. Valid values:

*   NEW
*   EXPIRED
*   ENABLED

Type.description:
The type of the backup. Valid values:

*   DEFAULT
*   NORMAL

BackupPeriod.description: The automatic backup cycle. Unit: days.

NextImageCreateTime.description: The next time when the image is created. The value is accurate to the millisecond. The value is a UNIX timestamp.

BackupHourInDay.description: The backup time in the 24-hour format.

SpInstanceId.description: The ID of the backup. This parameter is available only for HSM backups in the Chinese mainland.

AutoImageCount.description: The number of images that are automatically backed up.

OwnerInstanceId.description: The ID of the HSM to which the backup belongs. This parameter is available only for HSM backups outside the Chinese mainland and the value of this parameter is consistent with the value of InstanceId.

ReleaseTime.description: The time when the backup is released. The value is accurate to the millisecond. The value is a UNIX timestamp.

AutoImageCount.description: The number of images that are automatically backed up.

BackupHourInDay.description: The backup time on the hour that is in the 24-hour clock.

SpInstanceId.description: The ID of the backup. This parameter is available only for HSM backups in the Chinese mainland.

ReleaseTime.description: The time when the backup is released. The value is accurate to the millisecond. The value is a UNIX timestamp.

SyncCluster.title: SyncCluster
SyncCluster.description:
*   This operation is used for manually synchronizing data within clusters located in the Chinese Mainland. For clusters outside the Chinese Mainland, automatic data synchronization is supported, and this operation is unnecessary. If you attempt to use this operation, a 400 error code will be returned.
*   The data synchronization takes approximately 5 minutes. To avoid service interruptions, we recommend performing this operation during off-peak hours.

LeaveCluster.title: LeaveCluster
LeaveCluster.summary: Removes a hardware security module (HSM) from the current cluster.
LeaveCluster.description:
*   If non-master HSMs exist in a cluster, the master HSM cannot be removed from the cluster.
*   After the master HSM is removed from a cluster, the cluster enters the TO_DELETE state and cannot be restored to the available state. Proceed with caution.

schema.description: The ID of the master HSM.

CreateCluster.title: CreateCluster
CreateCluster.summary: Creates a cluster by specifying a hardware security module (HSM) as the master HSM.
CreateCluster.description: The master HSM that you specify to create a cluster must be in the ACTIVE state.

schema.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 1000.

PageSize.description: The number of entries per page.

Status.description:
The status of the cluster. Valid values:

*   NEW: The cluster is not initialized.
*   INITIALIZED: The cluster is initialized.
*   DELETED: The cluster is deleted.
*   SYNCHRONIZING: The cluster is being synchronized.
*   TO_DELETE: The cluster is pending deletion.

ConfigClusterCertificate.title: ConfigClusterCertificate
ConfigClusterCertificate.description: For more information about how to create a self-signed certificate and a cluster certificate on an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance, see [Create a NIST FIPS-validated GVSM cluster](~~293585~~).

GetCluster.summary: Queries information about a specified cluster.

Status.description:
The status of the cluster. Valid values:

*   NEW: The cluster is not initialized.
*   INITIALIZED: The cluster is initialized.
*   DELETED: The cluster is deleted.
*   SYNCHRONIZING: The cluster is being synchronized.
*   TO_DELETE: The cluster is pending deletion.

CreateTime.title: 时间信息
CreateTime.description: The time when the cluster was created. Unit: milliseconds. The value is a UNIX timestamp.

RegionId.title: 地域与可用区信息
RegionId.description: The ID of the region in which the cluster resides.

VpcId.title: 网络配置信息
VpcId.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) to which the cluster belongs.

Whitelist.description: The IP address whitelist of the cluster.

Zones.description: The information about the zones in which the cluster is deployed.

ClusterCsr.title: 证书信息
ClusterCsr.description: The certificate signing request (CSR) file of the cluster.

ClusterOwnerCertificate.description: The self-signed certificate of the cluster.

Size.title: 实例信息
Size.description: The number of hardware security modules (HSMs) in the cluster.

NodeId.title: 状态
NodeId.description: The ID of the HSM in the cluster.

Master.description:
Indicates whether the HSM is a master HSM. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

ClusterMode.description:
The cluster mode.

2: automatically synchronizes the cluster.

ConfigClusterWhitelist.title: ConfigClusterWhitelist
ConfigClusterWhitelist.description: The IP address whitelist of a cluster has a higher priority than the IP address whitelist of a hardware security module (HSM) in the cluster. In cluster mode, we recommend that you create an IP address whitelist for your cluster. You do not need to create an IP address for the HSM in the cluster.

RotateClusterManagedCert.description:
## 请求说明
该API用于触发指定集群的管理证书轮转过程。通过提供`ClusterId`参数，可以指定需要进行证书轮转的集群。此操作有助于提高集群的安全性，建议定期执行。

### 注意事项
- 确保提供的`ClusterId`是有效的，并且用户具有对该集群的操作权限。
- 证书轮转可能会影响依赖于旧证书的服务，请在适当的时间窗口内执行此操作。

schema.title:
- **参数类型**: string
- **必填**: 是
- **后端接收参数**: clusterId

400.errorMessage: rotate cluster managed cert not support

403.errorMessage: caller has no permission

500.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to some unknown error.

DownloadClusterManagedCert.description:
## 请求说明
- 该API允许用户获取特定集群的管理证书。
- 返回的数据是经过base64编码的证书内容。

ResumeInstance.title: ResumeInstance
ResumeInstance.summary: Resumes a disabled hardware security module (HSM).

GetInstance.summary: Queries information about a specified hardware security module (HSM).

RequestId.title: 本次调用请求的ID，是由阿里云为该请求生成的唯一标识符，可用于排查和定位问题。

TenantIsolationType.title: 密码机硬件隔离类型，枚举值"vsm"虚拟密码机，"hostedHsm"托管硬件密码机
TenantIsolationType.description:
The type of HSMs that is classified based on resource isolation. Valid values: 
- vsm: Virtual security modules (VSMs)
- hostedHsm: Dedicated HSMs.

IsTrial.description:
Indicates whether the HSM is for trial use. Valid values:

*   true
*   false
IsTrial.title:
是否试用。

- true：是

- false：否

VpcId.title: 网络配置
VpcId.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) to which the HSM belongs.

VSwitchId.description: The ID of the vSwitch that is configured for the HSM.
VSwitchId.title: 密码机实例配置的交换机ID。

Ip.description: The IP address of the HSM in the VPC.
Ip.title: 密码机实例在VPC网络中的IP地址。

Whitelist.description: The IP addresses in the whitelist.
Whitelist.title: 白名单IP列表。

CreateTime.title: 时间信息
CreateTime.description: The time when the HSM was created.

ExpireTime.description: The time when the HSM expired.
ExpireTime.title: 实例过期时间。

ClusterId.title: 集群信息
ClusterId.description: The ID of the cluster to which the HSM belongs.

Master.description:
Indicates whether the HSM is a master HSM. Valid values:

*   true
*   false
Master.title:
是否为主密码机。 

- true：主密码机

 - false：子密码机

Status.title: 数据状态
Status.description:
The status of the HSM. Valid values:

*   PENDING: The HSM is disabled.
*   ACTIVE: The HSM is enabled.
*   EXPIRED: The HSM expired.
*   INVALID: The HSM is invalid.
*   FAILURE: The HSM failed to be created.
*   RESET: The HSM is being reset.
*   PAUSED: The HSM is paused.
*   MODIFYING: The HSM is being modified.

ListInstances.summary: Queries the hardware security modules (HSMs) that meet the query conditions.

schema.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 1000.

schema.title: 密码机硬件隔离类型，枚举值"vsm"虚拟密码机，"hostedHsm"托管硬件密码机
schema.description:
The type of HSMs that is classified based on resource isolation. Valid values:
- vsm: Virtual security modules (VSMs).
- hostedHsm: Dedicated HSMs.

Total.description: The total number of entries returned.

PageSize.description: The number of entries per page.

Status.description:
The HSM status. Valid values:

*   PENDING: The HSM is disabled.
*   ACTIVE: The HSM is enabled.
*   EXPIRED: The HSM expired.
*   INVALID: The HSM is invalid.
*   FAILURE: The HSM failed to be created.
*   RESET: The HSM is being reset.
*   PAUSED: The HSM is paused.
*   MODIFYING: The HSM is being modified.

GetJob.summary: Queries the details of an asynchronous task.

Type.description:
The operation type. Valid values:

*   create
*   cancel

Completed.description:
Indicates whether the task is complete. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Status.description:
The task status. Valid values:

*   success
*   running
*   fail
*   cancel

Response.description: The response returned after the task succeeds.

Error.description: The error message returned if the task fails.

Progress.description: The progress of the task. Unit: percent (%).
